alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Bradford, central Alachua and south central Union Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Upland Pines to near University Of Florida. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Worthington Spring, Alachua, Worthington Springs, University Of Florida, Beasley, New River, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua
